skin-care-regimens.title: REDEFINE Regimen
skin-care-regimens.description: Redefine your skin. Our best selling anti-aging skincare routine visibly lifts, sculpts + firms while minimizing the appearance of lines + deep wrinkles.
skin-care-regimens.details: What it is: A customizable anti-aging routine that combines Retinoid Science + exclusive Peptide Technology to visibly firm skin and combat key signs of aging. Why you need it: As we age, our skin’s natural cell turnover processes slow down. Promote youthful-looking skin as you define facial contours, minimize pores and smooth lines + wrinkles!

skin-care-regimens.title: REVERSE Regimen
skin-care-regimens.description: Bright + beautiful. Brightening ingredients like Salicylic Acid, Vitamin C and Retinol refine skin’s surface + tackle the look of fine lines + dark spots.
skin-care-regimens.details: What it is: A multi-tasking skincare routine that instantly brightens while visibly reducing discoloration + fine lines over time.     Why you need it: UV exposure can lead to sun damage, dark spots, and discoloration. Tackle and prevent visible dark marks, sunspots and unwanted freckles as you achieve more youthful-looking skin.

skin-care-regimens.title: UNBLEMISH Regimen
skin-care-regimens.description: Bye, breakouts + wrinkles! Our potent skincare routine for adult acne helps clear + prevent breakouts as it visibly minimizes pores + fine lines.
skin-care-regimens.details: What it is: A gentle yet effective skincare routine for acne and aging concerns. Clear and prevent breakouts while tackling visible signs of aging like uneven skin tone + loss of firmness. Why you need it: Effectively removing dirt, oil + impurities help clear skin and prevent future breakouts. Combined with the extra benefit of tackling fine lines + enlarged pores!

skin-care-regimens.title: SPOTLESS Regimen
skin-care-regimens.description: Give acne the 1-2 punch! Our skincare routine for teenage acne clears existing blemishes + prevents new breakouts with breakthrough BPO2 Technology.
skin-care-regimens.details: What it is: Our 2-step skincare routine for teens and young adults that helps to eliminate acne and blemishes, deep clean pores + control appearance of oil and shine. Why you need it: A consistent acne treatment can decrease discomfort and clear up the complexion. Increase confidence + comfort with our award-winning acne treatment for teens!

skin-care-regimens.title: REDEFINE + Total RF Serum Special
skin-care-regimens.description: A total anti-aging pairing! Total RF Serum and Redefine Regimen have been clinically tested to work together for visibly firmer, smoother, flawless-looking skin.
skin-care-regimens.details: What it is: Save 20% on Total RF Serum when bundled with Redefine Regimen! Energize millions of surface skin cells by 200% to address all key signs of aging, plus visibly firm, lift + sculpt skin. Why you need it: Skin energy is crucial for reviving and maintaining an overall youthful looking complexion. Total RF Serum revitalizes skin to help you see stronger, healthier, more resilient skin, while Redefine Regimen minimizes the appearance of lines and deep wrinkles. If this Redefine + Total RF Serum Special is part of a PC Perks enrollment order or added to a PC Perks/CRP replenishment order, the subsequent order will be the Total RF Serum Refill (a recyclable inner vial that easily twists into your glass bottle) and full price Redefine Regimen. Keep the outer glass bottle of your Total RF Serum for your refill.

skin-care-regimens.title: REDEFINE AMP It Up Special
skin-care-regimens.description: Amp up anti-aging. Amplify the anti-aging benefits of REDEFINE Regimen with our micro-exfoliating derma-roller + nighttime renewing serum to visibly lift, sculpt + firm.
skin-care-regimens.details: What it is: Save 20% when you bundle the REDEFINE Regimen with REDEFINE AMP MD System! This skin-revitalizing system improves the overall contour of your face while addressing fine lines, deep wrinkles, uneven texture + loss of firmness. Why you need it: Supporting the skin’s natural renewing process helps reveal younger-looking skin. These powerful products work together to visibly firm and refine uneven texture while also tightening pores.

lash-serum-and-eyebrow-tint.title: R + F Lash Boost
lash-serum-and-eyebrow-tint.description: #1 Premium Lash Serum in the U.S. in 2021!* Our famous lash conditioning serum is applied nightly to promote the appearance of longer, stronger and darker-looking lashes (or brows!)
lash-serum-and-eyebrow-tint.details: What it is: A nightly eyelash conditioning serum infused with technology to enhance the appearance of length, volume + definition of eyelashes and eyebrows. Why you need it: Lash durability can be enhanced with proper moisture and protection against breakage. Condition your eyebrows and eyelashes to achieve youthful, fuller-looking definition. *Source Euromonitor International Limited; Beauty and Personal Care 2022 Edition, retail value RSP terms; all channels; Lash Serum including Lash Serum products sold as part of Sets and Kits.

Clear adult acne + visibly improve signs of aging while enhancing the appearance of longer, darker, fuller lashes. lash-serum-and-eyebrow-tint.title: RECHARGE + Lash Boost Special
lash-serum-and-eyebrow-tint.description: Luminous skin + longer-looking lashes. Get a glowing, luminous look plus the appearance of lush, fuller-looking lashes with this set.

eye-creams-and-treatments.title: R+F Instant Targeted Firming Gel™
eye-creams-and-treatments.description: Instantly firm, tighten + smooth for a youthful look in just 5 minutes*, plus further reduce visible signs of aging in targeted area in just 4 weeks!
eye-creams-and-treatments.details: What it is: A clinically tested, multi-targeted skincare treatment that instantly* and visibly firms, tightens + smooths wrinkles, crow’s feet, sagging skin, under eye bags and expression lines. Overtime with continued use, targeted area will appear tighter with visibly fewer fine lines. Eco-friendly because it’s refillable! Keep the outer casing and cap for your refill.

eye-creams-and-treatments.title: R+F Instant Targeted Firming Gel Refill™
eye-creams-and-treatments.description: Never run out of your anti-aging treatment! Inner vial slides and twists into the reusable outer casing of R+F Instant Targeted Firming Gel™ for a simple, eco-friendly refill.
eye-creams-and-treatments.details: What it is: : A refill vial of our clinically tested, multi-targeted skincare treatment that instantly* and visibly firms, tightens + smooths wrinkles, sagging skin, under eye bags and expression lines. Overtime with continued use, targeted area will appear tighter with visibly fewer fine lines. *DISCLAIMER: Instant benefits take effect within approximately five minutes and are temporary. With continued use, benefits start to show at 4 weeks. Why you need it: Run out. Refill. Reuse. This sustainable solution easily locks into your refillable R+F Instant Targeted Firming Gel™ outer casing for maximum anti-aging benefits with minimal packaging waste.

eye-creams-and-treatments.title: REDEFINE Multi-Function Eye Cream
eye-creams-and-treatments.description: Younger-looking eyes in a wink! Our intensive anti-aging eye cream visibly firms + lifts to improve the look of fine lines, wrinkles, sagging + crow’s feet.
eye-creams-and-treatments.details: What it is: The ultimate eye cream for visibly reducing key signs of aging. Supports the skin barrier around the eye with Vitamins C+F, Grape + Daisy Botanical Extracts + Antioxidants.

eye-creams-and-treatments.title: Active Hydration Bright Eye Complex
eye-creams-and-treatments.description: Wake up to younger-looking eyes. Our illuminating gel cream reduces visible dark circles + under-eye puffiness over time.
eye-creams-and-treatments.details: What it is: Brightening, hydrating eye cream that targets signs of stress and fatigue by soothing skin around the eyes. For optimal results, use daily, morning and night. Why you need it: Stress, fatigue and dry skin can visibly affect the brightness of the eye area. Get a fresh, rested look and improves the appearance of under-eye puffiness.

face-serums.description: AMP up results by 3X! Our award-winning AMP-MD System uses a micro-exfoliating Derma-Roller to accelerate results of our nighttime Intensive Renewing Serum for firmer, smoother, younger-looking skin.
face-serums.details: What it is: A handheld derma-roller with micro-exfoliating tips that conditions the uppermost layer of skin to boost absorption + results of other products. Includes a derma-roller, serum and cleansing tablets.

face-serums.title: REDEFINE AMP MD System Refill
face-serums.description: Keep younger-looking skin in your future. This refill package contains a two-month supply of Intensive Renewing Serum + Purification Tablets to clean your AMP MD Derma-Roller and ensure even firmer + smoother-looking results.

The nighttime face serum empowers skin’s own renewing process and delivers a powerful dose of Vitamin A to reduce the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles + loss of firmness.

beauty-face-masks.description: Unmask younger-looking skin. Instantly refreshes, moisturizes + smooths skin while visibly improving fine lines + wrinkles over time.
beauty-face-masks.details: What it is: A bubbling, hydrating gel with exfoliating Jojoba Beads to remove dullness + reveal smoother, softer, more radiant-looking skin. you need it: As we age, our defenses weaken and skin loses elasticity. Hydrate tired, dry skin and smooth the look of fine lines + wrinkles over time.

beauty-face-masks.title: REVERSE Radiance Mask
beauty-face-masks.description: Reveal luminous skin. Fueled with age-defying Retinal-MD Technology to dial up skin’s radiance instantly while it evens skin tone over time.
beauty-face-masks.details: What it is: An intensive face mask with brightening Retinal-MD Technology, exfoliating Glycolic Acid and skin-boosting Turmeric Extract. Why you need it: Sun exposure can result in dullness + excessive pigmentation. Brighten skin on impact for a more radiant, translucent complexion.

beauty-face-masks.title: UNBLEMISH Clarifying Mask
beauty-face-masks.description: Unmask clear skin. Our blemish-fighting mask instantly reduces excessive oil + shine and helps prevent new pimples from forming.
beauty-face-masks.details: What it is: A clarifying mask with Sulfur to unclog pores, cleanse away acne bacteria + remove impurities from the surface of the skin, plus calming ingredients. Why you need it: Acne affects nearly 40% of adults. Prevent future breakouts and purifying the skin to reveal clearer, more radiant skin over time.

beauty-face-masks.title: RECHARGE Detox Mask
beauty-face-masks.description: Detoxify your skin. Draws impurities and environmental aggressors from skin while providing intense moisture for softer, more supple-feeling skin.
beauty-face-masks.details: What it is: An exfoliating mask fortified with Charcoal to help skin detox from environmental pollutants, plus intensive moisturizing ingredients. Why you need it: Environmental aggressors affect the skin daily. Instantly cleanse and purify the skin and see it more balanced and nourished with continued use.

beauty-face-masks.title: SOOTHE Rescue Mask
beauty-face-masks.description: Have a spa at home. This barrier-boosting face mask instantly delivers softer, smoother, fresher-feeling skin while soothing dry skin + visible redness over time.
beauty-face-masks.details: What it is: A soothing clay mask with moisture-attracting Glycerin to hydrate + protect dry skin while visibly reducing redness and blotchiness. Why you need it: When the moisture barrier is compromised, irritants can get through to skin. Transform dry, irritated skin into a clearer, healthier-looking complexion over time.
